languages.text: "Для нас вздохи, скрипы, стоны и бормотания корабля сродни журчанию ручьев и пению птиц для обитателей миров. Мы слышим, как корабль дышит, знаем, о чем он думает и что чувствует. Мы — часть корабля, а корабль — часть нас. Мы выполняем множество функций, среди нас есть немало офицеров. Одни следят за порядком и предотвращают бунты, другие служат пастырями и поддерживают экипаж, а кто-то посвящает себя заботе о душе и теле судна".

traits.locale_text: "Для нас вздохи, скрипы, стоны и бормотания корабля сродни журчанию ручьев и пению птиц для обитателей миров. Мы слышим, как корабль дышит, знаем, о чем он думает и что чувствует. Мы — часть корабля, а корабль — часть нас. Мы выполняем множество функций и предоставляем услуги как матросам, так и офицерской касте. Одни следят за порядком и предотвращают бунты, другие служат пастырями и поддерживают экипаж, а кто-то посвящает себя заботе о душе и теле судна".

languages.text: "To us, the groans, creaks, and murmurs of the ship sound the way babbling brooks and singing birds do to world dwellers. We hear the ship breathe, know what it is feeling and thinking. We are a part of the ship just like it is a part of us. We perform numerous functions, and there are many officers among our number. Some maintain order and prevent mutiny, others serve as shepherds and support the crew, and some devote themselves to mending the body and spirit of the vessel."
languages.original_text: "Для нас вздохи, скрипы, стоны и бормотания корабля сродни журчанию ручьев и пению птиц для обитателей миров. Мы слышим, как корабль дышит, знаем, о чем он думает и что чувствует. Мы — часть корабля, а корабль — часть нас. Мы выполняем множество функций, среди нас есть немало офицеров. Одни следят за порядком и предотвращают бунты, другие служат пастырями и поддерживают экипаж, а кто-то посвящает себя заботе о душе и теле судна".

traits.locale_text: "To us, the groans, creaks and murmurs of the ship sound like babbling of brooks and singing of birds to world dwellers. We hear the vessel breathe, know what it is feeling and thinking. We are a part of the ship just like it is a part of ourselves. We perform plenty of functions, there are many officers among our number. Some maintain order and prevent mutiny, others serve as shepherds and support the crew, and some devote themselves to mending the body and spirit of the vessel."

"To us, the groans, creaks, and murmurs of the ship sound the way babbling brooks and singing birds do to world dwellers. We hear the ship breathe, know what it is feeling and thinking. We are a part of the ship just like it is a part of us. We perform numerous functions, and there are many officers among our number. Some maintain order and prevent mutiny, others serve as shepherds and support the crew, and some devote themselves to mending the body and spirit of the vessel."

Some maintain order and prevent mutiny, others serve as shepherds and support the crew, and some devote themselves to mending the body and spirit of the vessel."

"To us, the groans, creaks, and murmurs of the ship sound the way babbling brooks and singing birds do to world dwellers. We hear the ship breathe, know what it is feeling and thinking. We are a part of the ship just like it is a part of us. We perform numerous functions, and there are many officers among our number. Some maintain order and prevent mutiny, others serve as shepherds and support the crew, and some devote themselves to mending the body and spirit of the vessel."

languages.text: «Para nosotros, los gruñidos, crujidos y murmullos de la nave tienen el mismo efecto que un arroyo o el canto de un ave tienen para los habitantes de los planetas. Oímos respirar a la nave y sabemos lo que siente y piensa. Somos parte de la nave y ella es parte de nosotros. Realizamos numerosas funciones y contamos con varios oficiales entre nosotros. Unos mantienen el orden y evitan motines, otros hacen las veces de pastores y ayudan a la tripulación y otros se dedican a reparar el cuerpo y el espíritu de la nave».
languages.original_text: "To us, the groans, creaks, and murmurs of the ship sound the way babbling brooks and singing birds do to world dwellers. We hear the ship breathe, know what it is feeling and thinking. We are a part of the ship just like it is a part of us. We perform numerous functions, and there are many officers among our number. Some maintain order and prevent mutiny, others serve as shepherds and support the crew, and some devote themselves to mending the body and spirit of the vessel."

traits.locale_text: «Para nosotros, los gruñidos, crujidos y murmullos de la nave tienen el mismo efecto que un arroyo o el canto de un ave tienen para los habitantes de los planetas. Oímos respirar a la nave y sabemos lo que siente y piensa. Somos parte de la nave y ella es parte de nosotros. Realizamos numerosas funciones y contamos con varios oficiales entre nosotros. Unos mantienen el orden y evitan motines, otros hacen las veces de pastores y ayudan a la tripulación y otros se dedican a reparar el cuerpo y el espíritu de la nave».

languages.text: “其他世界的居民习惯于潺潺的溪水声与鸟儿歌唱的声音，而对我们而言，我们对这艘船发出的吱嘎声、呻吟声与其他杂音习以为常。我们能听到这艘飞船的呼吸，理解它的感受与思想。我们是这艘船的一部分，而它也是我们的一部分。我们会履行各种职能。我们之中有许多军官，有的人负责维持秩序、阻止叛乱，有些人负责引导船员、提供支持，还有的人致力于修复这艘飞船的躯壳与精神。”
languages.original_text: "To us, the groans, creaks, and murmurs of the ship sound the way babbling brooks and singing birds do to world dwellers. We hear the ship breathe, know what it is feeling and thinking. We are a part of the ship just like it is a part of us. We perform numerous functions, and there are many officers among our number. Some maintain order and prevent mutiny, others serve as shepherds and support the crew, and some devote themselves to mending the body and spirit of the vessel."

traits.locale_text: “其他世界的居民习惯于潺潺的溪水声与鸟儿歌唱的声音，而对我们而言，我们对这艘船发出的吱嘎声、呻吟声与其他杂音习以为常。我们能听到这艘飞船的呼吸，理解它的感受与思想。我们是这艘船的一部分，而它也是我们的一部分。我们会履行各种职能。我们之中有许多军官，有的人负责维持秩序、阻止叛乱，有些人负责引导船员、提供支持，还有的人致力于修复这艘飞船的躯壳与精神。”

languages.text: 「私達にとって、船のギーギー、ミシミシ、カシャカシャという音こそ、惑星の民が聞く、小川のせせらぎや鳥のさえずりのようなものです。船の呼吸を聞いて、船の気持ちと思考を読み取ります。船が私達の一部であるのと同じく、私達も船の一部なのです。私達は多くの役割を果たしていて、その中にはたくさんの士官がいます。秩序を保って、反乱を防ぐ者もいれば、指導者としてクルーを支える者もいますし、船の体と心の修復に専念する者もいます」
languages.original_text: "To us, the groans, creaks, and murmurs of the ship sound the way babbling brooks and singing birds do to world dwellers. We hear the ship breathe, know what it is feeling and thinking. We are a part of the ship just like it is a part of us. We perform numerous functions, and there are many officers among our number. Some maintain order and prevent mutiny, others serve as shepherds and support the crew, and some devote themselves to mending the body and spirit of the vessel."

traits.locale_text: 「私達にとって、船のギーギー、ミシミシ、カシャカシャという音こそ、惑星の民が聞く、小川のせせらぎや鳥のさえずりのようなものです。船の呼吸を聞いて、船の気持ちと思考を読み取ります。船が私達の一部であるのと同じく、私達も船の一部なのです。私達は多くの役割を果たしていて、その中にはたくさんの士官がいます。秩序を保って、反乱を防ぐ者もいれば、指導者としてクルーを支える者もいますし、船の体と心の修復に専念する者もいます」

languages.text: "Für uns klingt das Stöhnen, Ächzen und Murmeln des Schiffs wie sprudelnde Bäche und singende Vögel für Weltbewohner. Wir hören das Schiff atmen und wissen, was es fühlt und denkt. Wir sind ein Teil des Schiffs, genau wie es ein Teil von uns ist. Wir übernehmen zahlreiche Funktionen, und es gibt unter uns viele Offiziere. Manche sorgen für Ordnung und verhindern Meutereien, andere unterstützen als Hirten die Crew, und wieder andere widmen sich dem Heil von Körper und Geist des Schiffs."
languages.original_text: "To us, the groans, creaks, and murmurs of the ship sound the way babbling brooks and singing birds do to world dwellers. We hear the ship breathe, know what it is feeling and thinking. We are a part of the ship just like it is a part of us. We perform numerous functions, and there are many officers among our number. Some maintain order and prevent mutiny, others serve as shepherds and support the crew, and some devote themselves to mending the body and spirit of the vessel."

traits.locale_text: "Für uns klingt das Stöhnen, Ächzen und Murmeln des Schiffs wie sprudelnde Bäche und singende Vögel für Weltbewohner. Wir hören das Schiff atmen und wissen, was es fühlt und denkt. Wir sind ein Teil des Schiffs, genau wie es ein Teil von uns ist. Wir übernehmen zahlreiche Funktionen, und es gibt unter uns viele Offiziere. Manche sorgen für Ordnung und verhindern Meutereien, andere unterstützen als Hirten die Crew, und wieder andere widmen sich dem Heil von Körper und Geist des Schiffs."

languages.text: « Pour nous, les grincements et les murmures du vaisseau sont comme le clapotis de l'eau ou le chant des oiseaux aux oreilles des habitants des mondes. Nous entendons le vaisseau respirer, nous savons ce qu'il ressent et pense. Nous faisons partie de lui, tout comme il fait partie de nous. Nous remplissons diverses fonctions et comptons de nombreux officiers parmi nous. Certains maintiennent l'ordre et empêchent les mutineries, d'autres jouent le rôle de guides et soutiennent l'équipage, tandis qu'il y en a qui se consacrent à la réparation du corps et de l'esprit du vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "To us, the groans, creaks, and murmurs of the ship sound the way babbling brooks and singing birds do to world dwellers. We hear the ship breathe, know what it is feeling and thinking. We are a part of the ship just like it is a part of us. We perform numerous functions, and there are many officers among our number. Some maintain order and prevent mutiny, others serve as shepherds and support the crew, and some devote themselves to mending the body and spirit of the vessel."

traits.locale_text: « Pour nous, les grincements et les murmures du vaisseau sont comme le clapotis de l'eau ou le chant des oiseaux aux oreilles des habitants des mondes. Nous entendons le vaisseau respirer, nous savons ce qu'il ressent et pense. Nous faisons partie de lui, tout comme il fait partie de nous. Nous remplissons diverses fonctions et comptons de nombreux officiers parmi nous. Certains maintiennent l'ordre et empêchent les mutineries, d'autres jouent le rôle de guides et soutiennent l'équipage, tandis qu'il y en a qui se consacrent à la réparation du corps et de l'esprit du vaisseau. »

languages.text: "Yeryüzü sakinleri için derelerin çağlaması ve kuşların ötüşü neyse bizim için de geminin gıcırtıları, çatırtıları ve homurtuları odur. Geminin nefesini duyar, ne hissedip düşündüğünü biliriz. O nasıl bizim bir parçamızsa biz de onun parçasıyız. Sayısız işlevi gerçekleştiririz, ayrıca birçoğumuz subaydır. Bazıları düzeni sağlayarak isyanı önler, bazıları çoban görevi görerek mürettebata destek olur, bazılarıysa kendini geminin bedeniyle ve ruhunu onarmaya adamıştır."
languages.original_text: "To us, the groans, creaks, and murmurs of the ship sound the way babbling brooks and singing birds do to world dwellers. We hear the ship breathe, know what it is feeling and thinking. We are a part of the ship just like it is a part of us. We perform numerous functions, and there are many officers among our number. Some maintain order and prevent mutiny, others serve as shepherds and support the crew, and some devote themselves to mending the body and spirit of the vessel."

traits.locale_text: "Yeryüzü sakinleri için derelerin çağlaması ve kuşların ötüşü neyse, bizim için de geminin gıcırtıları, çatırtıları ve homurtuları odur. Geminin nefesini duyar, ne hissettiğini ve ne düşündüğünü biliriz. O nasıl bizim bir parçamızsa biz de onun bir parçasıyız. Sayısız işlevi gerçekleştiririz ve aramızda birçok subay bulunur. Bazıları düzeni sağlayarak isyanı önler, bazıları çoban görevi görerek mürettebata destek olur, bazılarıysa kendini geminin bedeniyle ve ruhunu onarmaya adamıştır."
